mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(commitTime, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) AS completedCount FROM userTask WHERE studentId = #{studentId} AND status = 1 AND commitTime IS NOT NULL GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(commitTime, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month

SELECT task_month, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completedCount, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'uncompleted' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS uncompletedCount FROM ( SELECT ut.studentId, DATE_FORMAT(ut.beginTime, '%Y-%m') AS task_month, CASE WHEN COUNT(ut.status) = SUM(CASE WHEN ut.status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) THEN 'completed' ELSE 'uncompleted' END AS status FROM userTask ut WHERE ut.taskId IN ( SELECT id FROM task WHERE beginTime >= #{arg0} AND beginTime < #{arg1} ) GROUP BY ut.studentId, DATE_FORMAT(ut.beginTime, '%Y-%m') ) AS student_monthly_status GROUP BY task_month ORDER BY task_month
